articles.title: Replacement named as Sri Lanka lose another key player to injury - T20 World Cup
articles.description: Sri Lanka have been forced into another change to their squad at the ICC Men's T20 World Cup with news that left-arm pacer Binura Fernando has a hamstring injury and will miss the remainder of the tournament.
